info.description: SARC Next Generation - Resource Reservation and Management API
info.title: SARC-NG API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all buildings in the system

post.description: Create a new building with the provided name and code

get.description: Retrieve a specific building by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing building's name and code by ID

delete.description: Delete a building by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all classes in the system

post.description: Create a new class with the provided name and capacity

get.description: Retrieve a specific class by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing class's name and capacity by ID

delete.description: Delete a class by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all lessons in the system

post.description: Create a new lesson with the provided title, duration, and start time

get.description: Retrieve a specific lesson by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing lesson's title, duration, and start time by ID

delete.description: Delete a lesson by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all reservations in the system

post.description: Create a new reservation with resource, user, and time information

get.description: Retrieve a specific reservation by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing reservation's resource, user, time, and status information by ID

delete.description: Delete a reservation by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all resources in the system

post.description: Create a new resource with name, type, and availability information

get.description: Retrieve a specific resource by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing resource's name, type, and availability by ID

delete.description: Delete a resource by its ID
